text: Ona noted those told Ona Have je boj; all ona have observe Zmluva Prayers (Salat) je dat zavazny laska k bliznemu (Zakat) potom when boj decreed them they feared ludia mat rad vela mat rad they feared GOD je vecer inak They said Our Lord Ona force this boj us? If len Ona respite us awhile! Say latka this world je nil chvila Hereafter bol daleko lepsie righteous ona never suffer slightest injustice
